name: Slimey Champions
description:
Slimey Champions is all about hacking and slashing. Get loot, level up and learn new skills in this solo indie made action rpg.

* Items.
* Skills.
* Slimes, pick the color you want on your slime.
* Boss encounters.
* 2 slime champions to choose from, each with their own look, skills and weapons.
* Music made by Mibli.
* When you create a new game with another character, all your items from your previous character will be gone.
* There's only one save file. If you start a new character and save, the last save file will be overwritten.
